item.title: Improving Communication in Distributed Teams with Advanced Haptic Technology
item.description: Listen to the interview with our engineer: Introduction In today’s fast-paced and globally connected world, distributed teams have become the norm for tech companies. However, communicating effectively across different time zones and locations can be a real challenge. At ShitOps, we believe that effective communication is the key to successful teamwork and project delivery. That’s why we set out to find an innovative solution to enhance communication in distributed teams using advanced haptic technology.
